scenario_text.value:
That was unreal! So freakin’ cool! It’s like
something straight out of a movie!

(Ugh, this is the last thing I need right
now!)
Hey, let’s get closer so we can take a video!

Sweet! This is gonna blow up on social media
for sure!
Whoa! That was a close one! I almost got hit!
Yikes! Watch out for that debris!

Everyone stay back! This is really dangerous,
so you need to keep your distance!
